groups.name: nlp.onnx
groups.description: Configuration properties for NLP ONNX classifier.

properties.name: nlp.onnx.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable NLP ONNX autoconfiguration.

properties.name: nlp.onnx.model-path
properties.description: Path to the model directory containing model.onnx and config.json.

properties.name: nlp.onnx.vocabulary-path
properties.description: Optional path to custom vocabulary file.

properties.name: nlp.onnx.warmup
properties.description: Whether to perform model warmup on startup.

properties.name: nlp.onnx.warmup-texts
properties.description: Sample texts to use for model warmup.

properties.name: nlp.onnx.preprocessing.lowercase
properties.description: Whether to lowercase text during preprocessing.

properties.name: nlp.onnx.preprocessing.remove-urls
properties.description: Whether to remove URLs during preprocessing.

properties.name: nlp.onnx.preprocessing.normalize-whitespace
properties.description: Whether to normalize whitespace during preprocessing.
